ygData.subject: RE: Patch update message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It drains mana.  I tested it on some friends while in the Arena.  No formal timings, but it took about a half minute to drain a bubble of mana from a
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 13 Oct 1999, CYR, Thierry wrote:
>
> speakin of which, what exactly does level 35 song do? i bought it last night
> and tried it on some rats and stuff, they didnt even take any damage

It drains mana. I tested it on some friends while in the
Arena. No formal timings, but it took about a half minute to
drain a bubble of mana from a like-level ranger. Figure a
caster has a lot more mana and can kill you a lot quicker, and
about the only use for it is to prevent someone from
meditating in PvP.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
